field.name: publishedfilter
field.label: Hide unpublished items
field.description: Allows to exclude unpublished items from processing. *** This 100% affects only content processing, extension integrators may not support this, depending on a version. See the hints for each extension for more detailed information.

field.name: accessfilter
field.label: Access filter
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to filter items by access level while looking for the most recent one. There are three modes available: 1 = Process all items(without taking access level into account at all), 2 = Show modification date for only public items, 3 = Process using current user access level. This mode is NOT recommended, as it will work only if caching is turned off(otherwise it will process only public records, as mode 2), and that'll increase system loads. Use the third mode only in case you really need it. *** This 100% affects only content processing, extension integrators may not support this, depending on a version. See the hints for each extension for more detailed information.

field.name: @spacer
field.description: Parameters below are used for integration with other Joomla extensions. Do not turn those options on if you don't have theese extensions.

field.name: username
field.label: Show last active editor
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to display the name of the user who made last changes in the content your site. Such settings as access filter and similar affect this option as well.

field.name: virtuemart
field.label: Virtuemart integration
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to look for last update as well in Virtuemart tables,and defines how these results are produced (separately or together)

field.name: joomfish
field.label: Joomfish integration
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to look for last update as well in JoomFish translation, and defines how these results are produced (separately or together)

field.name: joomgallery
field.label: Joomgallery integration
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to look for last update as well in JoomGallery, and defines how these results are produced (separately or together)

field.name: docman
field.label: DOCman integration
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to look for last update as well in DOCman, and defines how these results are produced (separately or together)

field.name: weblinks
field.label: Weblinks integration
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to look for last update as well in Weblinks (Joomla default component), and defines how these results are produced (separately or together)

field.name: users
field.label: Last registration
field.description: Defines whether it's necessary to display last user's registration date, and defines how these results are produced (separately or together)

field.name: cacheresults
field.label: Data Caching
field.description: Select whether to cache calculated last modification time. Calculation requires 1-2 additional queries to DB for each type (content, virtuemart etc), so it's strongly recommended to turn this on. Make sure that module's folder is writable.

field.name: cachetime
field.label: Caching time (s)
field.description: Set the cache living time in seconds (>1). The smaller the value is, the sooner your new modification time will be shown after updating the site (if you have many visitors. If they are few, they'll probably get the right time at once), but this may lightly increase system load. It is recommended to set this value no less than to 600-900 sec for rapid updates, and to about 15000-21600 for sites that don't update more frequently than twice a day.

field.name: cachemark
field.label: Display CACHED note
field.description: Display a small note when using a cache. (This note is embedded directly into the cache.) You can specify its appearance in the CSS - by 'cachemark' class

field.name: cachemarktext
field.label: CACHED note
field.description: Set the text that will be displayed when using a cache. (Supports strftime syntax as well.)

field.name: cachetimeoffset
field.label: CACHED note offset (min)
field.description: Allows to specify an offset for the time in the CACHED mark. This may be useful in case you are running the core and database engine on different machines, in the other case set it same as Time offset.(May be negative).

field.name: moduleclass
field.label: Module class
field.description: Allows to specify certain class for module div
